EmailTemplate.name: 03-20-23 CP Banking SKO Invite LATAM.03-20-23 CP Banking SKO Invite LATAM Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date: NCR LATAM Banking Sales Kickoff 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Save the Date: LATAM Banking Sales Kickoff 2023 Dear Valued Channel Partners, Following our recent Global Channel Sales Kickoff, we will continue driving our partners’ growth and enablement with a Banking-focused agenda and supporting materials. To connect as a Banking Channel community and learn about key initiatives for the upcoming year, please save the date to join our Banking Sales Kickoff webinar <[[https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/3eb1c951-f1ae-4615-964d-799a9d6bab01@ae4df1f7-611e-444f-897e-f964e1205171?mkt_tok=NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAGKje6VWtCCt1R5NuQF6ddcWY__Muxcl0GSg5HE_T3r9E1OlKuN0MGNyLK5jLOnkkuYlOfzcHmiPimjxBw5EA]]> for LATAM on April 10, 2023. During the kickoff, we will celebrate highlights of our Partners’ accomplishments over the past year, share market insights, and discuss solution roadmaps. We have achieved a great deal together, and we are committed to further supporting our partners to reach even greater heights in 2023. Registration is now open <[[https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/3eb1c951-f1ae-4615-964d-799a9d6bab01@ae4df1f7-611e-444f-897e-f964e1205171]]>, so please make sure you and your teams are signed up: LATAM Banking Sales Kickoff 2023: Virtual webinar Date: Monday, April 10, 2023 Time: 11:00am – 12:30pm Eastern Daylight Time Location: Virtual webcast (click here <[[https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/3eb1c951-f1ae-4615-964d-799a9d6bab01@ae4df1f7-611e-444f-897e-f964e1205171]]> to register) If you have any questions or need additional information, please reach out to your channel account manager or email ChannelSales.NCR@ncr.com. We look forward to sharing more details with you and to working together to have our best year yet! Best regards, The NCR Partner Network Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
